com.interface21.jdbc.core
Class SQLErrorCodeSQLExceptionTranslater

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.interface21.jdbc.core.SQLErrorCodeSQLExceptionTranslater
All Implemented Interfaces:
SQLExceptionTranslater
public class SQLErrorCodeSQLExceptionTranslater
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLExceptionTranslater

Implementation of SQLExceptionTranslator that uses specific vendor codes defined in a configuration file named "sql-error-codes.xml". More precise than SQLState implementation, but vendor specific. The JdbcTemplate class enables error handling to be parameterized without making application's dependent on a particular RDBMS.

Author:
Rod Johnson, Thomas Risberg
